IELTS Test Preparation

International English Language Testing System (IELTS) is a standardized English language proficiency test that is required for international studies, profession, and immigration purposes. In this test, listening, writing, reading, and speaking abilities of the individual is tested with a bunch of assessment questionnaires. This is the most popular English Language Test based on paper writing and face to face to interview. This exam is essential to validate your English proficiency level if you are preparing for further study at a college, university, or migration procedure. The test is scored on a nine-band scale, with a score of 1 being the lowest and 9 being the highest. The test results are valid for two years from the test date.

The Academic and General Training examinations are the two different IELTS test categories. The General Training test is intended for those who wish to work, train, or migrate to an English-speaking country, while the Academic test is for those who want to study in an English-speaking academic institution.

IELTS preparation class in A One Global will make you ready to answer all the questions in your IELTS test with confidence. All four skills, Reading, Writing, Speaking and Listening, will be covered in this course. The course will enhance your academic word bank which will increase your chance of getting higher score in your test. We will be sharing various tips and tricks on how to impress the examiner with your answer. All activities will be comprised of authentic test materials and be evaluated based on official IELTS score. Students will learn time management skills and see their scores improve in just a short period of time.

Our focus of preparation is on following points:

  • Developing high skills in all the four fields
  • Brushing up your language skills through intensive preparation by our senior and experienced IELTS Tutor.
  • Our instructors leave no stones unturned in preparing the candidates academically and also boosting confidence that will help to cope up in new environment.

As a candidate gearing up for IELTS exam, you can expect:

  • Experienced and proficient faculty with proven success record
  • Exclusive and extensive study rich material
  • Personalized assistance
  • Excellent infrastructure which includes a well-equipped library with latest books on IELTS.
  • FREE Full Set Mock tests every Friday
  • Visiting faculty on Saturdays in Master Class.
  • Free proficiency test and review by Instructor every day.
  • Unlimited Mock test to enrolled students.

Our well-structured course helps the candidates in:

  • Helps to develop reading, writing, listening and speaking skills for IELTS General training or Academic examination.
  • Our expert tutor will guide you and prepare quickly to improve your IELTS band score and also you can familiarize with test format and restrictions.
  • We aid you in preparing for IELTS test across four skill areas – reading, listening, writing and speaking.
  • We help you to master practical and useful tips and guide you in developing exam skills, explanations of assessment criteria.

Frequently Asked Questions

The European business visa is mainly for people who want to participate in business meetings, conferences in Europe. Visa holders are not allowed to work or seek employment in Europe. Individuals and circumstances influence how long it takes to apply for a business visa.
